message.content:
cs.SY, cs.AI, cs.LG, cs.CE, cs.ETM 

This paper proposes a feedback system design for demand side management, which involves modelling a group of thermostatic loads using a Markov jump process. The paper discusses the optimization of regulation signals and the control of thermostatic loads, which suggests a focus on control systems (cs.SY) and artificial intelligence (cs.AI). The simulation results presented in the paper also suggest a possible application of machine learning (cs.LG) in the proposed framework. Additionally, the paper discusses the fundamental parameters of the regulation provider, which could be related to control engineering (cs.CE) and energy and power systems (cs.ETM).
